markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1514) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

</column>

---

You can parry attacks against you with your weapon. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirements.

<title level="2">Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler) leads to...</title>
[Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1545)
name: Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)
requirement: You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
